slides.title: The Challenge: Observability Transformation
slides.content:
**The Challenge:**
Organizations struggle with observability complexity

**Do it with AI** with Elastic’s managed OTLP endpoint

**What it is:** makes it easy to send OpenTelemetry data, logs, metrics, and traces, without OTel Collectors or semantic conversions.

**Common Use Cases:**
• Elastic Cloud using the OTLP protocol
• with Elastic handling scaling

**Technical Requirements:**
• You don't need to use APM Server when ingesting data through the Managed OTLP Endpoint

**Impact:** Transform your Observability operations with ai innovation innovation
slides.business_value: Transform your Observability capabilities - through advanced technical capabilities and streamlined operations
